title: Full Circle
dialogue_triumphs: 'Garif, we must live up to our names. We must make this decision – together.' 'Yes, of course. But you will agree, it does require some thought.'
goofs: Tom Baker says 40,000 generations at one point when he should have said 4000.
The technology of Gallifrey and Alzarius/Terradon is very interchangeable.
When Romana asks the Doctor 'What was that noise?' in episode one, it might be the fly that's buzzing around his head.

continuity_notes.name: TARDIS Scanner
continuity_notes.description: A device in the TARDIS that shows images of the exterior or other locations. It has various functions beyond a simple camera, including showing future events, connecting to telepathic circuits, and displaying false locations.
continuity_notes.current_status: Malfunctioning due to being in E-space, showing Gallifrey instead of Alzarius.

continuity_notes.name: Charged Vacuum Emboitement (CVE)
continuity_notes.description: An incredibly rare phenomenon that allows passage between universes.
continuity_notes.current_status: The TARDIS has passed through a CVE into E-space.

continuity_notes.name: TARDIS
continuity_notes.description: The Doctor's time and space machine.
continuity_notes.current_status: Weighs 5x10^6 kilos according to Romana, but this is likely the interior weight rather than the exterior.

continuity_notes.name: Adric
continuity_notes.description: A new companion introduced in this story.
continuity_notes.current_status: Given a homing device to find the TARDIS and receives his brother's Outler belt of marsh-reed.

continuity_notes.name: Alzarius
continuity_notes.description: A planet of hyper-evolutionary creatures in E-space.
continuity_notes.current_status: Experiencing Mistfall, a period when creatures emerge from the marshes.

continuity_notes.name: Terradon
continuity_notes.description: A planet in E-space, origin of the crashed starliner on Alzarius.
continuity_notes.current_status: Not directly seen, only referenced as the origin of the crashed ship.

technobabble: The binary coordinates are 1001100 by 02 from galactic zero centre.
roots: The Creature from the Black Lagoon
links: The Doctor mentions looking forward to seeing Leela and Andred again.
The Key to Time is referenced.
Romana's room is seen, and Adric briefly picks up her boater from 'City of Death'.

locations.name: Alzarius
locations.description: A planet in E-space with hyper-evolutionary creatures and a crashed Terradonian starliner.
locations.current_status: Experiencing Mistfall, a periodic event that triggers the emergence of marsh creatures.

untold_adventures: The kidnapped human from the previous story has now been returned to Earth.
additional_notes: The episode explores themes of evolution, hidden histories, and the nature of identity. It introduces the concept of E-space and sets up a new story arc.
bottom_line: A brilliantly constructed tale, blessed with good visuals and a cracking pace. There's scarcely a shot or a line that isn't needed.
